Question 4:
```{r}

queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant")

#a.
queue[5] = "serpent"

#b.
queue <- queue[-c(1)]

#c.
queue <- c("donkey", queue)

#d.
queue <- queue[-c(5)]

#e.
queue <- queue[-c(3)]

#f.
queue <- c(queue[1:2], "aphid", queue[3])

#g.
which(queue == "aphid")

```


Question 5:
```{r}


numbers <- c(1:100)

# Filter numbers that are not divisible by 2, 3, or 7
filtered_numbers <- numbers[!(numbers %% 2 == 0 | numbers %% 3 == 0 | numbers %% 7 == 0)]

```
